text: #BridgeCollapse SAWS says its closest station to Sandton is Emmarentia. Average wind speed there was 8km/h & wind gusts of 30km/h recorded.
A probe has been ordered into the  #Grayston  #BridgeCollapse #ANN7 #DStv405 pic.twitter.com/8sPfpD719C
#BridgeCollapse City of Jhb: "We do not anticipate that M1 will be open by tomorrow morning. We urge motorists to use alternative routes."
#BridgeCollapse Makhura adds that he has confidence in the investigation by the City of Johannesburg into the reasons for the collapse.
Just another reminder that we should live each day as if our last - special prayers for all affected #bridgecollapse #Lordhavemercy

Forget wind. I wasn't alone in feeling a sizeable tremor while at work yesterday - could that have contributed to the #BridgeCollapse ?
